entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 10.
